mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Partner(storeIdx,userIdx) VALUES(#{storeIdx}, #{userIdx}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE storeIdx = #{storeIdx}, userIdx = #{userIdx}
mapper.select: select s.storeIdx,s.storeName, s.storeImage, s.storeBrand as storeType, s.reserveStatus, s.couponStatus, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(reviewScore) / COUNT(reviewIdx), 1), 0) FROM Reviews r WHERE r.storeIdx = s.storeIdx) AS reviewStar FROM Visited v join Stores s on v.storeIdx = s.storeIdx WHERE v.userIdx=#{userIdx} Order By v.updatedAt DESC LIMIT #{pageInfo.firstIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}
